Detailed Description

Author:
Group 20:
  • Pradyumna Kumar
  • Jayanth Tadinada
  • Sharjeel Imam
Version:
1.1

DESCRIPTION

The following is C code for the learner robot to recieve the encoded task, decode it and then perform the task. This code runs on Firebid V robot with Zigbee module for wireless communication.

Define Documentation

#define LEFT_MOTOR_SPEED   170

Left motor speed.

#define RIGHT_MOTOR_SPEED   170

Right motor speed.

Function Documentation

void init_usart0 (  )

Function To Initialize USART0 desired baud rate: 9600 actual baud rate: 9600 (error 0.0%) char size: 8 bit parity: Disabled

ISR ( INT5_vect   )

Right interrupt handler. Increase right shaft count

ISR ( INT4_vect   )

Left interrupt handler. Increase left shaft count

int main (  )

Main function. Initialize devices, ports, interrupts and set motor speed.

SIGNAL ( SIG_USART0_RECV   )

Signal to denote that data has been recieved by USART0 (Zigbee). Store the characters in the string till the termination character 'x' is recieved. Once 'x' is recieved, print the string on LCD and then call the function to perform the task

Variable Documentation

char data

Stores recieved charater.

int size = 0

Counter to store characters into the task string.

char task[40]

The complete encoded task recieved.
